en.correction:
Dear Kim,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to reach out and let you know that your recent post about finding a new job has really resonated with me. It's so important to stay positive and focused on our goals, even when things seem tough. I completely agree with you that it's never too late to make a change and pursue something new.

I also want to share some advice from my own experience in job hunting. Firstly, don't be afraid to ask for help! Reach out to friends, family members, or colleagues who may have connections in the industry you are interested in. Networking can be a powerful tool in landing your dream job.

Secondly, tailor your resume and cover letter to each specific job you apply for. This might mean rewriting them multiple times, but it will pay off in the long run as employers will see that you are genuinely interested in their company and have taken the time to research its needs.

Lastly, practice makes perfect! The more interviews you go on, the better you will become at answering questions confidently and concisely. Don't worry if you feel nervous; everyone does. Just remember to breathe, relax, and

en.text_to_correct: Dear Kim
en.correction:
Dear Kim,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to reach out and let you know that your recent post about dealing with anxiety has really resonated with me. It's so important to talk about mental health and share our experiences because it helps others feel less alone in their struggles.

I completely understand what you mean about feeling overwhelmed by daily life. Sometimes, it can be hard to find a balance between work, family, friends, and personal time. Add in any additional stressors like financial worries or relationship problems, and it can become even more challenging to maintain a sense of calm and well-being.

One thing that has helped me immensely is practicing mindfulness. Mindfulness is all about being present in the moment and not letting your thoughts drift off into the future or dwell on the past. It might sound simple, but it can make a huge difference in how you approach life. When you're feeling anxious, try taking a few deep breaths and focusing on the sensations in your body - the rise and fall of your chest, the warmth of your skin, the sound of your breathing. This will help ground you in the present moment and reduce feelings of overwhelm.

Another helpful tip

en.correction:
Pat's Story

When I was a little girl, my father took me to the library every Saturday. We would spend hours browsing through books, picking out new ones to read, and checking out our favorites. My love of reading began there, and it has never waned. As an adult, I still find myself spending countless hours in libraries, searching for that perfect book to lose myself in.

One day, while I was perusing the shelves at the local library, I came across a book with a dusty cover and worn spine. The title caught my eye - "The Secret Garden." Intrigued, I checked it out and took it home. Little did I know that this book would become one of my all-time favorite stories!

"The Secret Garden" is about a young girl named Mary Lennox who loses her parents in an earthquake in India. She is sent back to England to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote Yorkshire estate. Unhappy and lonely, Mary discovers a hidden garden behind a locked door in the house. en.correction:
To the Manager of the

Store Name

Address

City, State, Zip Code

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the service I received at your store yesterday. I visited your store to purchase a gift card, but was told that you were out of stock. The sales associate informed me that they would be receiving more cards in two weeks. However, when I returned two weeks later, there were still no gift cards available.

Upon further investigation, I discovered that several other customers had experienced similar issues with your store's inventory management. This has led me to believe that there may be a systemic problem within your organization that needs to be addressed.

In light of these concerns, I kindly request that you take immediate action to rectify this situation. Please ensure that your staff is properly trained on inventory management and that they are held accountable for their actions. Additionally, I suggest implementing a system to track customer complaints and feedback so that improvements can be made accordingly.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

Your Customer's Name

Email Address

Firstly, many people find themselves overwhelmed by the sheer number of choices available to them when they go shopping. This can lead to indecision and frustration, as well as a sense of being lost in a sea of options. Additionally, some individuals may feel pressured to buy things they don't really need or want simply because they see others around them making purchases. This can result in feelings of guilt and dissatisfaction later on. Finally, it is worth noting that shopping can sometimes be physically exhausting, particularly if you spend long hours walking through crowded stores or malls. This can leave you feeling drained and stressed out, which hardly makes for an enjoyable day. In conclusion, while shopping can certainly be fun and rewarding at times, it is also important to remember that it isn't always enjoyable.

it.text_to_correct: Citt X, 14.05.2011 Caro Francesco, congratulo con te per avere superato l'esame, ed inoltre con il massimo dei voti!
it.correction: Citt X, 14.05.2011 Dear Francesco, I congratulate you for passing the exam and also for achieving the highest score!

it.text_to_correct: Dopo la maturit professionale ho comincato a lavorare ed adesso non trovo pi il coraggio (o la voglia) di studiare.
it.correction: After my professional maturity I started working and now I don't have the courage (or the desire) to study anymore.

it.text_to_correct: Come ho scritto prima, ho gi qualche esperienze lavorative: ho lavorato in Italia con il programma Leonardo da Vinci.
it.correction: Come I have written before, I already have some work experience: I worked in Italy with the Leonardo da Vinci programme.

it.text_to_correct: Prima di tutto vorrei commentare i requisti richiesti nell'annuncio, e vorrei presentare la mia esperienza lavorativa.
it.correction: First of all, I would like to comment on the requirements requested in the announcement and I would like to present my work experience.

it.text_to_correct: In ufficio c' molto lavoro e gioved pomeriggio non posso incontrarti perch il mio capo ha organizzato una riunione.
it.correction: In the office there is a lot of work and on Thursday afternoon I can't meet you because my boss has organized a meeting.

it.text_to_correct: Posso ricevere una camera all'hotel del mio fratello e voi due potete passare le vacanze romantico a Citt X se volete!
it.correction: Posso ricevere una camera all'hotel del mio fratello e voi due potete passare le vacanze romantiche a Citt X se volete!

it.text_to_correct: Mia sorella era malata fra due giorni e poi non ha potuto andare con mio fratello in Francia per vedere i nostri parenti.
it.correction: My sister was sick for two days and then couldn't go with my brother to France to see our relatives.

it.text_to_correct: In Citt X, c' una scuola di lingue straniere, allora ho la possibilit di imparare l'italiano: la lingua, mi piace tanto.
it.correction: In City X, there is a school of foreign languages, so I have the opportunity to learn Italian: the language, I like very much.

it.text_to_correct: D'altra parte, sono sicura che i campi estivi sarebbero ideali per me, perch una volta lavoravo in un campo di questo tipo.
it.correction: On the other hand, I am sure that summer camps would be ideal for me because once upon a time I worked at a camp like this.

it.text_to_correct: Per esempio puoi lavorare in un centro commerciale \\\" Centro X a Citt Y o puoi lavorare nell'asilo o diventi proffessore.
it.correction: For example, you can work at a shopping center "Centro X" in City Y or you can work at the nursery or become a teacher.

it.text_to_correct: In ufficio c' molto lavoro e gioved pomeriggio non posso incontrare con te, perch il mio capo ha organizzato una riunione.
it.correction: In the office there is a lot of work and on Thursday afternoon I cannot meet with you because my boss has organized a meeting.

it.text_to_correct: Ho devuto andare ai mio lavoro alle 8 la mattina; il mio capo ha domandato di fare tutte le domande scritte in una settimana.
it.correction: I had to go to work at 8 in the morning; my boss asked me to write all the questions within a week.

it.text_to_correct: Adesso sto per assumere il lavoro presso Unicredit Banca con la sede in Paese X, a Citt Y, cominciando dal mese di settembre.
it.correction: Now I am going to start working at Unicredit Bank with its headquarters in Country X, City Y, beginning from September.

it.text_to_correct: (- -- - -- - --) Non ho saputo cosa devo fare, perche ho ricevuto tantissimi messaggi, ma 4 settimane dopo questo  stato finito.
it.correction: (- -- - -- - --) I didn't know what to do because I received so many messages, but 4 weeks after this it was all over.

it.text_to_correct: Ho letto il vostro annuncio delle \\\" Serate di cucina internazionale \\\" e devo dire, che lo  stato molto interessante per me.
it.correction: Ho letto il vostro annuncio delle "Serate di cucina internazionale" e devo dire, che lo  stato molto interessante per me.

it.text_to_correct: Veramente spero che, con l'impegno messo ad imparare bene l'italiano, adesso sia il momento per me di poter trovare un bel'lavoro.
it.correction: Veramente spero che, con l'impegno messo ad imparare bene l'italiano, ora sia il momento per me di poter trovare un bell'impiego.

it.text_to_correct: Una Residence normalmente non  vecchia come la Sua e il lago non dovrebbe essere neanche cos lontano con solo pochi collegamenti.
it.correction: A residence normally isn't as old as yours and the lake shouldn't be that far away with only a few connections.

it.text_to_correct: Vengo da tornare da Citt Y dove ho visitato un'altra ditta che potrebbe essere utile per il mio nuovo prodotto che sto sviluppando.
it.correction: I come back from City Y where I visited another company that might be useful for my new product that I am developing.

it.text_to_correct: Sto imparando la lingua Italiana all'istituto Italiano di Cultura a Citt X, da alcuni anni frequento un corso \\\" Conversazione \\\".
it.correction: Sto imparando la lingua italiana all'Istituto Italiano di Cultura a Citt X, da alcuni anni frequentavo un corso "Conversazione".

it.text_to_correct: Non potrei imaginarmi di scrivere, di parlare, o anche di lottare con una persona che ho visto mai, anche se  un pensiero interessante.
it.correction: I couldn't imagine writing, speaking, or even fighting with a person I have never seen, although it is an interesting thought.

it.text_to_correct: IN UFFICIO C' MOLTO LAVORO E GIOVEDI POMERIGGIO NON POSSO INCONTRARMI CON TE: MIO CAPO HA ORGANIZZATO UNA RIUNIONE GIOVED POMMERIGGIO.
it.correction: IN THE OFFICE THERE IS A LOT OF WORK AND I CANNOT MEET YOU THIS AFTERNOON BECAUSE MY BOSS HAS ORGANIZED A MEETING ON FRIDAY AFTERNOON.

it.text_to_correct: Inoltre io colgo l'occasione di invitarvi per una settimana nell piccola citt se avrete un po tempo dopo di tornare dal vostro viaggio.
it.correction: In addition, I take the opportunity to invite you for a week in the small town if you have some time after your trip.

it.text_to_correct: Nel tempo libero, faccio sempre la dansa classica due volte alla settimana e vado al corso d'italiano il mercoledi - allora niente novit!
it.correction: In my free time, I always do classical dance two times a week and go to Italian class on Wednesday - nothing new there!

it.text_to_correct: Mi immaginerei un corso in un gruppo nuomente piccolo - 4 persone al massimo - se questo non  possibile prenderai dei lezioni individuali.
it.correction: I imagine a course with a group no larger than four people at most - if this is not possible you will take individual lessons.

it.text_to_correct: Io trovo benissimo che il denaro guadagnato sia usato per finanziare progetti di sviluppo in paesi come l'Africa, l'Asia o l'America latina.
it.correction: I find it very good that the money earned is used to finance development projects in countries like Africa, Asia or Latin America.

it.text_to_correct: Vorrei partecipare in primo ciclo di serate (quello di maggio), ma devo chiederVi le informazioni pi dettagliate sul calendario degli incontri.
it.correction: I would like to participate in the first cycle of meetings (the one in May), but I need more detailed information on the schedule of the meetings.

it.text_to_correct: La cosa invece che mi piace di pi che quando vado all'estero posso communicare una lingua oltre la mia madrelingua e questo fa parte una cultura.
it.correction: The thing I like most when I go abroad is that I can communicate a language other than my mother tongue and this is part of another culture.

it.text_to_correct: Invece, l'inglese, che lo aveva usato prima moltissimo quando lavorava, solo l'uso quando stiamo con gli amici stranieri che non parlano italiano.
it.correction: In contrast, English, which he had used a lot before when working, only uses it when we are with foreign friends who don't speak Italian.

it.text_to_correct: Se si cercava un'alternativa, non si  trovata ci che i campi da tennis sono stati in riparazione e l'animazione c'era solo una sera la settimana.
it.correction: If you were looking for an alternative, you didn't find what the tennis courts have been under repair and there was only one night of animation a week.

it.text_to_correct: Due settimane fa sono stata al vostro \\\" Residence del Lago \\\" per passare una vacanza di sport e relax - come avete scritto sul vostro annuncio.
it.correction: Due settimane fa sono stato al vostro "Residence del Lago" per passare una vacanza di sport e relax - come avete scritto sull'annuncio.

it.text_to_correct: Alla presente allego il mio Curriculum Vitae dal quale risulta il mio percorso formativo, i corsi linguistici fatti ed altri interessi professionali.
it.correction: Alla presente allegato il mio Curriculum Vitae, dal quale risulta il mio percorso formativo, i corsi linguistici fatti ed altri interessi professionali.

it.text_to_correct: Ancora volta mi dispiace, ma non  mia colpa, Mio capo ha organizzato una runione giovedi pomeriggio e per questo dobbiamo cambiare nostro appuntamento.
it.correction: Another time I'm sorry, but it's not my fault. My boss has organized a meeting on Thursday afternoon and for this we have to change our appointment.

it.text_to_correct: Anche io ho una notizia a darvi, sono fidanzata di un ragazzo gentili e mi piacerebbe molto andare al vostro matrimonio con lui cos potresti conoscerlo.
it.correction: Also, I have some news for you, I am engaged to a nice guy and it would be great if you could come to my wedding with him so that you can meet him too.

it.text_to_correct: I miei fratelli ed io abbiamo portato le nostre raccette, nella speranza di potersi allenare, ma anche questa promessa dell'annuncio non  stata mantenuta.
it.correction: I miei fratelli and I brought our rackets in the hope of being able to practice, but even this promise of the announcement has not been kept.

it.text_to_correct: Io vi ringrazio di avermi invitare, per non potrei venire perch devo andare in Francia per vedere la mia famiglia, che no visto di dopo le vacanzia di natal.
it.correction: Io vi ringrazio di avermi invitato, ma non potrei venire perch devo andare in Francia per vedere la mia famiglia, che non ho visto da dopo le vacanze di Natale.

it.text_to_correct: Residence al Lago Maria Rossi Strada Maggiore 2 / D Citt X Ungheria 13 / 08 / 2011 Egregio Signore / a, La scrivo al riferimento dei servizi del Suo residence.
it.correction: Residence al Lago Maria Rossi Strada Maggiore 2/D Citt X Hungary 13/08/2011 Egregio Signore, I write to you in reference to the services of your residence.

it.text_to_correct: Redi 3 Sinalunga (SI) ITALIA In risposta al vostro annuncio voglio presentarmi e chiedere della possibilit di fare uno stage o un tirocinio nella vostra societ.
it.correction: Redi 3 Sinalunga (SI) ITALIA In response to your announcement I would like to introduce myself and ask for the possibility of doing an internship or training in your company.

it.text_to_correct: Vorrei passare l'estate prima dello studio lavorando nella sua agenzia che mi piace molto per fare esperienze nel mondo lavorativo e per conoscere meglio l'Italia.
it.correction: I would like to spend the summer before starting my studies working in his agency which I really enjoy because it allows me to gain experience in the world of work and to get to know Italy better.

it.text_to_correct: Forse c' la possibilit per te di lavorare qualche mese alla pari all'estero per mantenere le tue conoscenze linguistiche ed allargare il tuo orizzonte culturale.
it.correction: Forse c' la possibilit per te di lavorare qualche mese alla pari all'estero per mantenere le tue conoscenze linguistiche ed allargare il tuo orizzonte culturale.

it.text_to_correct: Sono stata impiegata in GAL (Gruppo Azzione Locale) quindi lo so come importante  il sviluppo, anche presso l'universita sto studiando politico di sviluppo reggionale.
it.correction: I have been employed at GAL (Gruppo Azzione Locale), so I know how important it is to develop, even within the university where I am studying political development of regions.

it.text_to_correct: CARO GIORGIO, AVENDO LETTO LA TUA LETTERA SUL GIORNALE \\\" SETTIMANA GIOVANI \\\", NON RIESCO A NON RISPONDERTI, PER RACONTARE LA MIA ESPERIENZA, MOLTO SIMILE ALLA TUA.
it.correction: Caro Giorgio, avendo letto la tua lettera sul giornale "Settimana Giovani", non riesco a non rispondereti, per raccontare la mia esperienza, molto simile alla tua.

it.text_to_correct: Quando abbiamo del tempo libero lo passiamo in modo attivo; preferiamo visitare le chiese, i monumenti, camminare lungo le piazze, guardare le fontane, le mostre nei musei.
it.correction: When we have free time, we spend it actively; we prefer to visit churches, monuments, walk along the squares, look at fountains, attend exhibitions in museums.

it.text_to_correct: Ritengo che le mie competenze da me acquiste possono essere utili per organizzare il recupero di materiale riciclabile anche all'estero in caso in cui l'interprete  necessario.
it.correction: I believe that the skills I have acquired can be useful for organizing the recovery of recyclable materials even abroad in case an interpreter is needed.

it.correction: 3 marzo 2012 Per ALI - Agenzia Lavoro Interinale Via Dante Alighieri 40 I - 42010 Reggio Emilia ITALIA Egregi Signori, Mi chiamo Maria Rossi e ho gi finito i miei studi a Citt X.

it.correction: I would like to offer my help to your Institute, to assist the inhabitants of Latin America and to develop my personality, to get to know other countries, other cultures.

it.text_to_correct: Adesso Vi prego di riflettere in che modo dovete migliorare la Vostra programma nel \\\" Residence del Lago \\\" o di corretare la pubblicit che poi tutti possono vedere la realt.
it.correction: Now I ask you to reflect on how you must improve your program at the "Residence del Lago" or correct the advertising that everyone can then see the reality.

it.text_to_correct: Ho cominciato a studiare l'inglese molto presto, quando andavo al asilo e continuavo anche dopo, fino a quando avevo la possibilit di andare all'estero, in Inghilterra per due mesi.
it.correction: I started studying English very early on, when I went to kindergarten, and continued even after that until I had the opportunity to go abroad, to England for two months.

it.text_to_correct: Inoltre, come brasiliana e sapendo che il progetto aiuta a finanziare grupi con scopo di sviluppamento in America latina, mi sento ancora pi felice e soddisfata di poter partecipare.
it.correction: In addition, as a Brazilian and knowing that the project helps to finance groups with development goals in Latin America, I feel even happier and more satisfied to be able to participate.

it.text_to_correct: Mi piace moltissimo aiutare alle innocenti e vorrei recuperare i materiali riciclabili e poi venderle nei mercatini dell'usato che il denaro guadagnato potrei dare ai poveri bambini e ragazzi che non possono liberarsi della loro pesante e triste.
it.correction: I love helping the innocent and I would like to recover recyclable materials and then sell them in second-hand markets that the money earned could be given to poor children and young people who cannot free themselves from their heavy and sad burden.

it.text_to_correct: Penso che la societa sia formata cos, anch'io avevo quel pensiero ma quando sono andato in viaggio in Africa, mi sono riso conto che siamo privilegiati, tutti noi che viviamo in uno stato senza dittatura e dove esiste una copertura malattia sociale.
it.correction: I think society is formed this way, and I had that thought too, but when I went on a trip to Africa, I realized we are privileged, all of us who live in a state without dictatorship and where there exists a social health coverage system.
